tool_description: Generate an Image Screenshot from a URL. Handles width, heightCustom JavaScript code, specific CSS Selector to screenshot and multiple image formats (png, jpg, gif, webp, jp2 and tiff)
name: Screenshotty
title: Screenshotty

api_list.name: TakeScreenshotPOST
api_list.description: Receives a URL, takes the screenshot and return the image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://screenshotty1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/screenshot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "screenshotty1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://screenshotty1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/screenshot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "screenshotty1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
